sentence:
Ms. TITUS. Mr. Speaker, I was absent from the floor and the roll call  votes today.

Had I been present, I would have voted: YEA on Roll Call No. 172, the  Motion to Suspend the Rules and Pass H.R. 1998; YEA on Roll Call No.  173, the Motion to Suspend the Rules and Pass H.R. 3394; and YEA on  Roll Call No. 174, the Motion to Suspend the Rules and…

Ms. TITUS. Mr. Speaker, I was absent from the floor and missed the  roll call votes. Had I been present, I would have voted: YEA on Roll  Call No. 315 on the Motion to Suspend the Rules and Pass S. 356--The  Secure Rural Schools Reauthorization Act of 2025, and YEA on Roll Call  No. 316 on the Motion to Suspend the Rules and Pass H.R. 1676--The Make…

Mr. COURTNEY. Mr. Speaker, I was absent from the chamber today. Had I  recorded my vote, I would have voted Yea on Roll Call No. 335, on the  motion to suspend the rules and pass S. 284, and Yea on Roll Call No.  336, on the motion to suspend the rules and pass H.R. 3187.
